A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: How could anybody at Disney think this would go well? We'll just ruin the Luke Skywalker character and kill him off\, fail to utilize one of the best villains to come along in quite sometime in Snoke\, make up ridiculous new force powers with no context or development\, fail to develop any new understanding of the force or the Jedi at the original Jedi temple\, fail to put any thought or development into Rey's lineage\, and make the entire movie about the most ridiculous slow-speed chase in movie history. They'll love it. Well played Disney. Well played.
